ticket.title: Problem with Range of Float in number_field_tag
ticket.original-body:
Rails 3.0.3 When number_field (number_field_tag) used with option :in=> range where range is Float then exception 'can't iterate from Float' appears Problem in method 'to_number_field_tag' line 924 code <code> options.update("min" => range.min, "max" => range.max) <code>
the reason described here http://ruby-doc.org/core/classes/Range.html#M000694
As fix I suggest to use first, last instead min,max like <code> options.update("min" => range.first, "max" => range.last) <code>
ticket.latest-body:

the reason described here http://ruby-doc.org/core/classes/Range.html#M000694
As fix I suggest to use first, last instead min,max like <code> options.update("min" => range.first, "max" => range.last) <code>

Rails 3.0.3
When number_field (number_field_tag) used with option :in=> range where range is Float then exception 'can't iterate from Float' appears
Problem in method 'to_number_field_tag' line 924 code

options.update("min" => range.min, "max" => range.max)

the reason described here http://ruby-doc.org/core/classes/Range.html#M000694

As fix I suggest to use first, last instead min,max like

options.update("min" => range.first, "max" => range.last)

Rails 3.0.3
When number_field (number_field_tag) used with option :in=> range where range is Float then exception 'can't iterate from Float' appears
Problem in method 'to_number_field_tag' line 924 code

options.update("min" => range.min, "max" => range.max)

the reason described here http://ruby-doc.org/core/classes/Range.html#M000694

version.title: Problem with Range of Float in number_field_tag

version.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.
The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.
Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
version.body-html:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.

The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.

Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
